verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is every one that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, That <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
For thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of thy <S%H3709>hands<s%>: <S%H835>Happy<s%> shalt thou <S%H2896>be<s%>, and it shall be well with thee.

Thy <S%H802>wife<s%> shall be as a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%>, In the innermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of thy <S%H1004>house<s%>; Thy <S%H1121>children<s%> like <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8363>plants<s%>, Round <S%H5439>about<s%> thy <S%H7979>table<s%>.
Behold <S%H1397><s%>, thus shall the man be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> That <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: And <S%H7200>see<s%> thou the <S%H2898>good<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%>.
Yea <S%H7200><s%>, see thou thy <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children<s%>. <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
